meanings.definition: To indulge in eating to excess.
meanings.sent1: During the holidays, it's easy to gormandize on festive treats.
meanings.sent2: He would often gormandize on fast food after a long day at work.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly said she would gormandize on cake until she turned into one.
meanings.sent4: The wealthy merchant would gormandize on exotic dishes every evening.
meanings.sent5: The competitive eater managed to gormandize an entire pizza in under five minutes.
